title: Blood Princess
description: One half-blood discovers her true origins as a creature the world has never seen before. New York Times bestselling author, K.N. Lee presents the third paranormal adventure in the Chronicles of Koa series.  The lines have been drawn, and a war between Netherworld vampires and the vampires of this world brews as Lera attempts to overtake the Lyrinian throne. First, Koa and the crew of supernatural soldiers must survive the wrath of angels, demons, and an entity that stalks the souls of all men. Death himself.
author: K.N. Lee
